A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: \"True\" Star Wars fans may have blind love\, but as a generic moviegoer\, Last Jedi wasn't that good of a movie. There were pointless and illogical plot elements (code breaker wasn't needed in the end\, old-peoples-speed-chase between Snoke's and the rebel ship)\, many scenes with over-acting (looking at you\, Poe-BB8 reunion)\, MCU-style jokes that didn't fit a Star Wars movie's tone\, and many payoffs that ended up being very underwhelming (Snoke was just some generic villian\, for example). Another big issue is that there wasn't much 3D to enjoy\, I felt ripped off for paying for 3D. The Infinity War trailer was shown at the beginning and that had amazing 3D. Whatever Star Wars 9 is gonna be\, I have 0 reasons to go watch it after seeing Last Jedi.
